byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Andrew E. Kramer from Moscow.

abstract: News Analysis; Russia's military involvement in Syrian war has done little to change course of events there or diminish influence of Islamic State, but has raised prominence of Russia and Pres Vladimir Putin on world stage; experts say Russia's hand in conflict has made its cooperation essential in Syrian peace talks but has also introduced further risks for Putin at home and abroad.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir V. Putin’s air campaign has helped him politically, but it has also come at great expense: in Russian lives, resources and a dangerous clash with Turkey.

headline.main: Putin Gambit Over Syria Proves to Be Dual-Edged Sword

snippet: Vladimir V. Putin’s air campaign has helped him politically, but it has also come at great expense: in Russian lives, resources and a dangerous clash with Turkey.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
